altTitles.ja: 魔女と傭兵
Majo to Youhei

description.en: Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. “I want you to protect me,” she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!

Futura, the land of Techs. This is the story of a boy named Tek who can't use Techs, but joins the Royal Guard of Futura. Through many harsh battles and emotional moments, he will persist to make Futura into a better nation!

(Note: It gets good 200 chapters in.)


♥ Animated Trailer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q7Z2A0Ba03A
♥ Discord: discord.gg/pVZts8fdTf
♥ Support: on patreon, if I open it again!

altTitles.en: Secretly, Secretly; But Unable to Hide It

description.en: That year, someone secretly wormed their way into Sang Zhi's heart and she fell in love with her brother's friend Duan Jiaxu. That older brother has beautiful peachy eyes and casually calls her a "kid". That spark of surprise when they first met made Sang Zhi want to slowly get closer to him, but the 7-year age difference felt like an insurmountable gap that she couldn't cross over. Not knowing when it started, the crush buried at the bottom of her heart sprouted, and slowly, it spread into his heart too...
description.zh: 那年，桑稚的心里偷偷地住进了一个人，喜欢上哥哥的朋友段嘉许，这个大哥哥有着好看的桃花眼，漫不经心的喊她“小孩”，初见的惊艳总是让桑稚忍不住想要靠近，但是7岁的年龄差仿佛又是他们无法逾越的鸿沟，不知从何时起，埋藏在心底的青涩暗恋逐渐发芽，慢慢地，也蔓延进了他的心里...【

title.en: Detective Conan - Ame wa Furanaide Kure (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 名探偵コナン - 雨は降らないでくれ (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja-ro: Meitantei Conan - Ame wa Furanaide Kure (Doujinshi)

description.en: Detective Conan DJ (Pairing for KenjixJinpei)

altTitles.ja: 離婚しない男 CASE２

description.en:
Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!

title.en: Ochame na Okusan to no Nichijou Chabangoto

altTitles.ja: とある奥さんの様子

altTitles.en: The State of a Certain Wife

altTitles.ja: お茶目な奥さんとの日常茶番事

altTitles.ja-ro: Ochame na Okusan to no Nichijou Chabangoto

description.en:
**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/gibagibagiba/status/1633031267829817344) (Chapter 2),
[Nico Nico Douga Manga](https://sp.manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63088) (Different chapter numbering)
- Defunct Official Raw (Chapter 1) - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/105860251), [FANBOX](https://gibagibagiba.fanbox.cc/posts/5412957)

altTitles.ja: おいでよ! マギカ堂書店

description.en: Madoka et al. working in a bookstore? More likely than you'd think! And their manager, Kyuubey, mistreats his employees while bootlicking his superiors (from Head Office)? Treat yourself to this light-hearted comedy with Madoka and friends hard at work in Magicado Bookstores!

title.en: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Master of Garden ~Shichikage Retsuden~

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！マスターオブガーデン～七陰列伝～

altTitles.en: The Eminence in Shadow: Master of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~
I Want To Become The Eminence In Shadow! Master Of Garden ~Seven Shadows Chronicles~

description.en:
Cid Kagenou, a boy who was enjoying the “eminence in shadow” setting in another world, plays the role of the justice with the girls called the Seven Shadows (they are very serious), such that the darkness of the world will disappear (maybe).

The curtain rises on an overwhelmingly chuunibyou and misunderstanding-filled serious comedy about the strongest Seven Shadows (and the protagonist)!?

A girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, the 'soulmate' decided to marry a man at the age of 28 because she did not want to live an "abnormal life". Only after leaving her to marry a man, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

altTitles.en: Where Is Justice for the Villainess?
Why Would a Villainess Have Virtue?
Why Would a Villainess Have Virtue

altTitles.ja: 悪女に義理などありません

description.en:
Charlotte had dedicated everything to the Emperor in the past... However, what she got in return was stone-cold betrayal and freezing loneliness.

But, while she had been awaiting her death after being confined in prison, a questionable man appeared in front of her!

"Could you help me murder the emperor?"

Charlotte, who had danced with a sword for the Emperor, meets Ruslan and is reborn as 'Juju.' Now, her sword is directed at the Emperor. And the two who had met as comrades start bearing feelings that go beyond just that...

A romance that blooms in a revenge story that's extravagant and strategic!

The story of the strong-willed and charismatic villainess, Charlotte!

"Why would a villainess have virtue?"

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/no-loyalty-villainess/list?title_no=3707)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/81743)
description.id:
Selama ini Charlotte telah mendedikasikan hidupnya untuk Albert, hingga Albert dapat menjadi kaisar. Namun, balasan yang ia dapatkan adalah pengkhianatan hingga Charlotte dipenjarakan sebagai seorang ‘penjahat’. Hingga suatu hari, seseorang bernama Ruslan datang untuk membebaskannya. “Apa kau bisa membunuh kaisar?” Ini adalah cerita balas dendam Charlotte.

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/no-loyalty-villainess/list?title_no=3707)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/81743)
description.ja:
皇帝に尽くしてきた過去を持つシャロテ… しかし、見返りは冷たい裏切りと凍てつくような孤独だった。そして残ったのは「悪女」という汚名だけ。皇帝に濡れ衣を着せられ監獄に囚われ死だけを待っていた彼女の前にある日、謎めいた男が現れる。そして驚くべき提案をする…！ 「皇帝を殺してくれないか？」 皇帝のために剣を振るってきたシャロテは、ルスランに出会い魔法で美しい「ジュジュ」として生まれ変わる。これからは皇帝に向けて剣を振るう！そして、シャロテとルスラン、2人の間にパートナー以上の気持ちが芽生え始める…華麗で戦略的な復讐劇とその中で花開くロマンス！ 最も強く魅力的なシャロテの物語が始まる！

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/no-loyalty-villainess/list?title_no=3707)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/81743)
description.ko:
황제에게 헌신했던 지난날의 샬로테…
하지만 정작 돌아온 것은 싸늘한 배신과
얼어붙을 만큼의 고독함, 그리고 '악녀'라는 오명뿐.

그러던 어느 날, 뇌옥에 갇혀 죽을 날만 기다리고 있던
그녀의 앞에 수수께끼의 남자가 나타난다.
그리고 그는 놀라운 제안을 하는데…!

"황제를 죽여주지 않겠어?"

황제를 위해 검무를 췄던 샬로테는 루슬란을 만난 뒤
'쥬쥬'로서 새롭게 태어나, 이제는 황제를 향해 검을 든다!

그리고 두 사람은 점점 파트너 이상의 마음이 생기는데….

화려하면서도 전략적인 복수극과
그 안에서 피어나는 로맨스!

가장 강인하고 매력적인 악녀 샬로테의 이야기!

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romantic-fantasy/no-loyalty-villainess/list?title_no=3707)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/81743)

title.en: Kimagure Orange Road - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.ja: きまぐれオレンジ★ロード
きまぐれオレンジ☆ロード
きまぐれオレンジロード
きまぐれオレンジ★ロード カラー版

description.en: KOR is the story of the Kasuga family, but mostly the oldest son, Kyosuke (who narrates), as they move to a new town after being found out to be a family of ESPers. Kyosuke meets a pretty young girl as he counts the "100 steps" (there may only be 99) that lead to his new school and is immediately smitten. However, the pretty young girl, named Ayukawa Madoka has agreed to help her best friend Hiyama Hikaru win Kyosuke. Thus, a love triangle is born.

altTitles.ja: Vドライブ!
寿司屋VSお嬢様
とけだせ! みぞれちゃん

description.en: Follow the antics of a snowman turned Yuki-Onna hellbent on destroying the sun with the help of a child named Himari and her Aunt Koharu.
description.vi: Hành trình tiêu diệt mặt trời của "nữ chúa tuyết" với sự giúp đỡ của Himari và họ hàng của mình.

altTitles.ja: 夢でフラれてはじまる百合

altTitles.en: Our Yuri Started with Me Getting Rejected in a Dream

altTitles.id: Kisah Yuri Kita Berawal Dari Diriku yang Ditolak di Dalam Mimpi

altTitles.en: Yuri That Starts With Getting Rejected In a Dream

altTitles.fr: Notre histoire commença lorsque ma confession fut rejetée dans mes rêves

altTitles.zh: 从梦里被拒绝开始的百合

altTitles.fr: Notre relation Yuri a commencé lorsque ma confession s'est fait rejeter dans mes rêves.
Notre histoire saphique commença lorsque ma déclaration amoureuse ne fut pas réciproque dans mon rêve

description.en:
For your very average high school girl, Tsukushi, there's her cool and beautiful childhood friend (with some very particular weaknesses) Hinoka. Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever… That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream.   The hypnagogic romantic comedy between a cheery maiden, and a cool girl which begins with a dream, starts right now!

 [Serialization of Popular Twitter manga by Hijiki](https://mangadex.org/title/088db207-6c42-4fa9-9e6f-1b831c21c1ac/a-yuri-manga-that-starts-with-getting-rejected-in-a-dream)
description.id: Tsukushi bermimpi ditolak saat menyatakan cintanya pada sahabatnya, Hinoka. Satu mimpi yang akan selalu menghantuinya, dan membuatnya mulai melihat Hinoka dengan cara yang berbeda.

altTitles.ja: 神殺しの模倣使い

description.en:
"If it’s to protect someone close to me… then I’d even kill a god."

Half a century ago, Dungeons, Monsters, as well as people who had received special abilities commonly referred to as [Skills] appeared. Those people were referred to as Adventurers and challenged dungeons in search of dreams and riches.

Kisaragi Tsukasa is one of these adventurers. However, he has received an inferior skill and was often treated as trash. One day, he was tricked by his peers and was thrown into a dangerous dungeon.

What awaited him at the other end was the Mythical monster, the God-Eater Fenrir. In despair over the overwhelming power difference, Tsukasa was prepared to die. That was when the master of the dungeon, Loki, appeared before him.

“Welcome to my castle.”

Thanks to Loki, Tsukasa’s skill evolved to become [Copycat]... A unique boy-meets-girl story woven into a modern battle fantasy is about to begin!

altTitles.th: เทพเกรียน โรงเรียนมัธยม

altTitles.ja: ゴッド・オブ・ハイスクール

description.en:
While an island half-disappearing from the face of the earth, a mysterious organization is sending out invitations for a tournament to every skilled fighter in the world. If you win you can have ANYTHING you want.  
They're recruiting only the best to fight the best and claim the title of The God of High School!

title.en: Totsuzen imouto ni natta doukyuusei to doukyo suru koto ni natta hanashi

altTitles.en: A story about living together with a classmate who suddenly became my younger sister

altTitles.ja: 回復職の悪役令嬢

description.en: Charlotte discovered that she was in the game world she played in her previous life when her engagement was broken off. With her cheat knowledge, she escapes from the scenario and changes her job to a <healer> in the enemy country, and enjoys a free adventurous life!
description.id: Ketika pertunangannya diputus, Charlotte menyadari bahwa dia berada di dunia game yang dia mainkan di kehidupan sebelumnya. Dengan pengetahuan cheatnya, dia melarikan diri dari skenario cerita dan mengubah pekerjaannya menjadi <Penyembuh> di negara musuh, dan menikmati kehidupan petualangan yang bebas!
description.ja: 婚約破棄されたことをきっかけに、ここが前世でプレイしていたゲーム世界だと気づいたシャーロット。チート知識でシナリオ脱出＆敵国で＜癒し手＞にジョブチェンジして、自由な冒険ライフを堪能します！

altTitles.ja: ディー・グレイマン

description.en:
Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."  
  
After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.
description.ru: Действие манги разворачивается в альтернативной Европе конца 19 века. Мир заселен Акума - созданиями Тысячелетнего Графа, созданными из механизма и человеческой души. Те, кто могут уничтожать Акума и освобождать души заключенные в них, называются экзорцистами, которые наделены некой Чистой Силой. Главный герой манги - Аллен Уолкер, юноша пятнадцати лет, проклятый Акума, носитель Чистой Силы в его левой руке. Путь Аллена Уолкера связан с его любовью к людям и Акума, путь, который принесет ему много неожиданностей…

altTitles.ja: パーフェクトワールド

description.en:
Kawana Tsugumi works for an interior design company. She goes to a drinking party at a client's architectural office and happens to meet her first love. He's more handsome than ever and it isn't until he's leaving that she realizes something has changed: Ayukawa is in a wheelchair.  
  
[From MU]

altTitles.ja: ギャル嫁の秘密

description.en: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...? A cute love comedy with a gal wife!
description.ja:
冬雪（ふゆき）は美人でクールなギャル！でも「旦那」の前だけ見せる秘密の姿があって……？SNS累計37万いいね！の可愛い「ギャル嫁」とのラブコメディ！
 
--- 
 
Fuyuyuki (Fuyuki) wa bijin de kūruna gyaru! Demo "dan'na" no mae dake miseru himitsu no sugata ga atte...? SNS ruikei 37 man ī ne! No kawaii "gyaru yome" to no rabukomedi!
description.es-la: ¡Fuyuki es una hermosa y atractiva gal! ¿Pero hay una parte de ella que solo le muestra a su esposo y mantiene en secreto del resto? Una linda comedia romántica con una esposa que es una gal.
description.pt-br: Fuyuki é uma linda gyaru! Mas tem um lado secreto que ela só mostra para o seu marido? Uma comédia romântica fofa com uma esposa gyaru!

title.en: S-Rank Monster no Behemoth Dakedo, Neko to Machigawarete Erufu Musume no Kishi (Pet) Toshite Kurashitemasu

altTitles.en: I Am Behemoth Of The S Rank Monster, But I Am Mistaken As A Cat And I Live As A Pet Of Elf Girl
I'm a “Behemoth,” an S-Ranked Monster, But Mistaken for a Cat, I Live As an Elf Girl's Pet
I’m an S-Rank "Behemoth" Monster, but I’m Living as a Knight (Pet) of an Elf Girl

altTitles.es: Soy un monstruo de rango S, Behemoth, pero me confundieron con un gato y ahora vivo como el caballero (mascota) de una chica elfa.

altTitles.ja: Sランクモンスターの《ベヒーモス》だけど、猫と間違われてエルフ娘の騎士(ペット)として暮らしてます
Sランクモンスターの《ベヒーモス》だけどネコと間違われてエルフ娘の騎士として暮らしています

altTitles.de: Ich bin ein mächtiger Behemoth und lebe als Kätzchen bei einer Elfe

altTitles.ru: Я монстр S-класса Бегемот, но меня перепутали с котом, и я живу у эльфийки как домашний питомец

altTitles.zh: 虽然是S级魔兽“比蒙巨兽” 却以猫的模样、成为精灵娘的骑士的日常

description.en: The elven girl Aria is a stunning and swift adventurer. When a small cat-like beast with an adorable face embraces Aria's fruitful chest during a dungeon exploration, she decides to keep it as a pet and names it "Tama". At first sight it's just an average cat, but Aria has yet to notice that Tama is a reincarnated chivalrous former Knight and that its identity is not that of a cat, but of a young monster of the strongest class "Behemoth".
description.es:
La chica elfa, "Aria" es una aventurera. Cuando una pequeña bestia con una cara adorable abraza el fructífero pecho de Aria, ella decide tenerla como mascota y la llama "Tama". A primera vista es sólo un gato común, pero Aria aún no se ha dado cuenta de que Tama es un antiguo Caballero y que su identidad no es un gato, sino un joven monstruo de la clase más fuerte "Behemoth".  
  
**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9107ee) (Raw)  
- [Official Light Novel (EN)](https://yenpress.com/9781975332945/im-a-behemoth-an-s-ranked-monster-but-mistaken-for-a-cat-i-live-as-an-elf-girls-pet-vol-1-light-novel/)
description.pt: A garota elfa, "Aria" é uma aventureira. Uma pequena besta com um adorável rosto abraça o peito frutoso da Aria, ela decide manter como um animal de estimação chamado "Tama". Ao primeiro sinal é apenas um gato comum, mas Aria ainda não notou que esta Tama é um cavaleiro antigo e sua identidade não é de um gato, mas um jovem monstro da classe mais poderosa chamada "Behemoth".

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!

altTitles.ja: 日曜日のいちごちゃん

altTitles.en: A First-Year High School Boy Whose Hobby Is Cross-Dressing

altTitles.ja-ro: Josou ga Shumi no Kou-1 Danshi

altTitles.vi: Trai lớp 10 có sở thích Giả Gái

description.en:
An ordinary high school boy, Yamano Itta, indulges his cross-dressing hobby by transforming himself into a beautiful girl named "Ichigo" once a week! One day, "Ichigo" ran into Kisaragi, a popular boy at school, and their sweet-and-sour romance will begin......!

Note: Originally self-published on Twitter as "女装が趣味の高1男子" (Josou ga Shumi no Kou 1 Danshi, Crossdressing High School Freshman), the first chapters were collected for commercial publication by Comic Pool on 2022-05-20 with the new name.

title.en: The Fallen Sage Rises to Power with the UR Inheritor Skill

description.en: In a world where "dungeons"  connected to another world have appeared, people who awaken to mysterious powers and defeat monsters for a living are called "adventurers." Yuto Kirishima draws the jackpot job of "Sage," but for some reason, his magic power is zero! He is looked down upon as the weakest sage who can't attack. Ultimately, he is abandoned by his companions and used as a sacrifice. Just then, a mysterious choice appears before him. "Do you want to perform this action?" When he answers, his abilities awaken and the UR skill "Inheritor" activates. This skill allows him to use the techniques of past sages! With the strongest skill in hand, the story of his struggle to rise as the strongest adventurer begins!
Chapter 1 in Naver's 2023 Rookie Short Story Collection (2023 루키 단편선).

title.en: I Have Nine Quadrillion Simp Gold Coins

altTitles.vi: Ta Có 90 Tỷ Tiền Liếm Cẩu!

altTitles.en: I Have 90 Billion Licking Gold Coins

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

title.en: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 嫁ぎ遅れた狐が嫁に来る話

altTitles.ja-ro: Totsugi Okureta Kitsune ga Yome ni Kuru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of the Fox Who Was Late Getting Married and Came to be My Bride

description.en: One day, Goro is taking a walk on the mountain behind his house and comes across a fox lying upside down on the side of the road... The fox yells 'Hey you! Got a moment?'  And well, if you've seen the title you know the rest.  This is a cute and fluffy romcom about a fox's wedding(?).

altTitles.ja: ８月のソーダ水

description.en:
(from mangaupdates):

Tales of the unusual residents staying in an equally unusual seaside town. Also includes the additional story "Uwa no Sora ga Oka Yori."

title.en: Isekai Furin ll ~Michibika Reshi Hitodzuma Tachi to Bukiyo Tensei Yuusha~

altTitles.ja: 異世界不倫Ⅱ～導かれし人妻たちと不器用転生勇者～

description.en:
An office worker, Yuuto Aida, witnesses his wife's affair at home!  When he jumps out of the house, he gets hit by a truck and is reincarnated in another world as a hero!!  However, due to the misunderstanding about Goddess Reincarnation, he only had one skill, it was a skill that could captivate other people's wives!!

(MTL)
description.id: Suami sibuk bekerja Istri sibuk selingkuh, Seorang pekerja kantoran, Yuuto Aida, menyaksikan perselingkuhan istrinya di rumahnya! Ketika dia melompat keluar rumah, dia ditabrak truk dan bereinkarnasi di dunia lain sebagai pahlawan!! Namun, karena kesalahpahaman tentang Reinkarnasi Dewi, dia hanya punya satu skill, itu adalah skill yang dapat memikat istri orang lain!!
description.ja: ごくごく普通のサラリーマン・愛田勇人（あいだ　ゆうと）は、自宅で妻の浮気現場を目撃！家を飛び出したところ、“例のトラック”に轢かれ──勇者として異世界転生することに！！しかし、転生の女神のひょんな勘違いから、たったひとつのスキルだけを彼は手に入れることになった──　それは、“人妻完全魅了（チャーム）”というスキル！世の人妻は皆すべて、彼に魅了される！！！！

altTitles.ja: 篠崎くんのメンテ事情

description.en:
Shinozaki – an everyday, ordinary salaryman whose head has been coming off too easily lately – finds his otherwise-typical life suddenly interrupted by a young woman named Yuuyake. 

According to her, Yuuyake’s magician grandmother modified Shinozaki’s body to an extreme degree in the past- and he’s chock-full of machinery! 

…All of which require maintenance that Yuuyake will apparently now be performing regularly. 

With that, the slightly off-color daily life of an utterly ordinary salaryman, a magician, and a strange black creature named Grey begins!

altTitles.ja: デカいはちの話

description.en: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.

title.en: Black Lagoon: Sawyer the Cleaner - Dismemberment! Gore Gore Girl

altTitles.ja: BLACK LAGOON 掃除屋ソーヤー 解体！ゴアゴア娘

altTitles.ja-ro: Black Lagoon Soujiya Sawyer - Kaitai! Gore Gore Musume

altTitles.ru: Черная лагуна: Расчленяющая уборщица Сойер! Окровавленная девушка

description.en: Sawyer is a cleaner who takes on the task of disposing of unwanted people in Roanapur, a city of vice where the mafia and other scoundrels thrive. Her daily life is depicted in a funny, sometimes horror-filled, sometimes action-packed, and even fantastical way as she goes about her work with her beloved chainsaw in hand. Her good friends and fellow freelancers Shenhua and Lotton, as well as familiar characters from the main story, such as Revy and Rock, also make appearances!

title.en: Isekai Tensei Shitemo Shounen Manga no Shujinkou wa 1-milli mo Burenai

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Tensei Shitemo Shounen Manga no Shujinkou wa 1-milli mo Burenai

altTitles.ja: 異世界転生しても少年マンガの主人公は1ミリもブレない!!!
レベリング・マーダー

description.en:
One day, Onitsuka Yamato, an office worker, kills another man who attacked him. When he took that man's life, a sound effect rang in his head informing him of his own strengthening and the acquisition of a spell. 

He had become a "murdelizer", a being whose level goes up when he kills someone. 

Yamato resolves to survive - even if it means killing people, kill someone within a week or else he will die.

title.en: Spice & Wolf: Merchants Meet City Life (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 狼と香辛料: 商人と都市生活の出会い

altTitles.ja-ro: Ōkami to kōshinryō: Shōnin to toshi seikatsu no deai

altTitles.en: Spice and Wolf: Merchants Meet City Life (Doujinshi)

description.en:
Kraft Lawrence, a 25-year-old traveling merchant, who meets Holo, a female wolf deity of wheat. Holo is known for blessing the harvest, but as humans have become more self-reliant and learned better farming methods, she has become a folktale. Lawrence and Holo travel together, with Holo helping Lawrence as a business partner in exchange for him taking her back to her home of Yuetsu. (Google AI)

In between Books 5 and 6 (LN). Holo and Lawrence are transported to the modern world, after receiving guidance from God himself, they make their way to their apartment. While walking there, Holo wanders where Col is, Lawrence, taking advantage of the situation, playfully teases Holo about her concern for Col.

altTitles.ja: マリッジトキシン

description.en:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
description.ja: <毎週水曜更新>殺し屋×結婚詐欺師の世界一ハードな婚活バトル物語！数百年続く殺し屋一族の青年・下呂。学校にも行かず裏稼業で生きてきた彼にとって女性は「苦手で縁遠いもの」であり、結婚は「するべきではないもの」と考えていた。だがある日、血が絶えることを恐れた彼の実家は、下呂が結婚し子供を残さないならば、妹に「それ」を強制することを通告。困り果てた下呂は仕事のターゲットであった結婚詐欺師に…。
description.pt-br:
Um assassino de aluguel e uma vigarista de casamentos partem na batalha mais cansativa do mundo! 

Gero é um jovem de um clã de assassinos, que existe há centenas de anos. Como alguém que nunca foi à escola e viveu sua vida lidando com o lado sombrio do negócio, ele se considera “sem perspectivas com mulheres” e o casamento é “algo que não é para ele”. No entanto, um dia, com medo de que sua linhagem se dissolva, seu clã avisa Gero que, se ele não se casar e ter um herdeiro, eles não terão escolha a não ser… forçar sua irmãzinha a fazer “isso”. Levado ao extremo, Gero pede ao alvo de seu trabalho, uma vigarista de casamento, para que...

altTitles.en: I Will Live as an Actor

altTitles.ja: 役者として生きる

description.en: To escape a life of poverty, Jang Youngkuk aspired to be a famous actor. And he succeeds... at the cost of his mother's life. Upon proceeding to take his own out of despair, Youngkuk miraculously returns to his childhood. With a second chance to make things right, he swears to abandon acting and be the good son he never was. However, when financial troubles begin to haunt Youngkuk and his mother, he discovers that he may have no choice but to return to the set for one last take.

altTitles.de: Ich würde mir gerne eine Freundin ausleihen

altTitles.th: สะดุดรักยัยแฟนเช่า

altTitles.ja: かのかり
彼女、お借りします

altTitles.vi: Dịch Vụ Cho Thuê Bạn Gái

description.en:
Kinoshita Kazuya is a regular college student who was just dumped by his girlfriend for another guy. Feeling down in the dumps, he decides to use an app called Diamond to hire Mizuhara Chizuru, a rental girlfriend, to make himself feel better. From their first meeting, she seems to be the perfect girl for him, but is there more to her than meets the eye? And how will their not quite typical relationship develop?

---
**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
description.fr: Kinoshita Kazuya est un étudiant régulier qui vient d'être largué par sa petite amie pour un autre gars. Se sentant dans les décharges, il décide d'utiliser une application appelée Diamond pour embaucher Mizuhara Chizuru, une petite amie de location, afin de se sentir mieux. Dès leur première rencontre, elle semble être la fille parfaite pour lui, mais est-ce qu'il y a autre chose pour elle que ce qui est à l'oeil? Et comment va se développer leur relation pas tout à fait typique?
description.it: Kinoshita Kazuya è un normale studente universitario che è stato appena lasciato dalla sua ragazza. Devastato, decide di usare un app chiamata "Diamond" per reclutare Mizuhara Chizuru, una ragazza a noleggio per tirargli su il morale. Fin dal loro primo incontro, sembra essere la ragazza perfetta per lui, ma ci sarà altro dietro a quell'immagine da "brava ragazza"…? E come si evolverà la loro inusuale relazione?
description.pt: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar uma aplicação de relacionamentos depois de ter levado terminado com a sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!
description.ru: Двадцатилетний никудышный студент университета муниципального района Киносита Кадзуя. Встреча с «особенной» красавицей ознаменует начало изменений в его жизни?!
description.es-la: Kinoshita Kazuya es un estudiante universitario normal al que su novia acaba de dejar por otro chico. Sintiéndose deprimido, decide usar una aplicación llamada Diamond para contratar a Mizuhara Chizuru, una novia de alquiler, para sentirse mejor. Desde su primer encuentro con ella, parece ser la chica perfecta para él, pero ¿hay más en ella de lo que parece? ¿Y cómo se desarrollará su relación no muy típica?
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar um aplicativo de relacionamentos depois de ter levado um fora de sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!

altTitles.ja: Kurosu maneji
クロス・マネジ

description.en: "Hard working" or "passionate" was not in Sakurai's vocabulary and joining a team sports in school was out of the question. But one day, he accidentally walks in on his female classmate Toyoguchi naked in the locker room and in return for keeping it a secret from everyone else, he is forced to become the manager for the female lacrosse team. Toyoguchi is passionate about lacrosse and was responsible for creating the team for the school. Sakurai reluctantly begins his role as manager but is slowly drawn into Toyoguchi's personality and begins researching and enjoying the sport. The once lazy Sakurai who was scared of failure now learns to put himself out there and put serious effort into something worthwhile.
description.pt-br: “Trabalho duro” ou “apaixonado” não estava no vocabulário de Sakurai e ingressar em um time de esportes na escola estava fora de questão. Mas um dia, ele acidentalmente encontra sua colega Toyoguchi nua no vestiário e, em troca de manter isso em segredo de todos os outros, ele é forçado a se tornar o gerente do time feminino de lacrosse. Toyoguchi é apaixonado por lacrosse e foi o responsável pela criação do time da escola. Sakurai relutantemente começa seu papel como gerente, mas aos poucos é atraído pela personalidade de Toyoguchi e começa a pesquisar e a gostar do esporte. O outrora preguiçoso Sakurai que tinha medo do fracasso agora aprende a se expor e a se esforçar seriamente em algo que vale a pena.

title.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game as an NPC

altTitles.ko: 망겜 속에 갇혔다 근데 이제 NPC를 곁들인

altTitles.en: Trapped in a Cursed Game, but Now With NPCs

description.en:
I'm going to live a normal life!

...said Shari Azriel, the apothecary of the Dover village.

Then one day, I realised that I possessed an NPC in a video game! I've been locked up here for two years, and I only just noticed.

If I can't get out of the game...
"A, in their 20's, was found starved to death while playing VR games."
This could be what I'm remembered as!

"I have to get out!"

However, it was too late when I came to the realisation that... I can't log out because of an error!

That means, the only way out would be approaching the male lead, "the Lord of Nightmares," and helping his comrades defeat the final villain. So I have no choice but to wait until the game ends...

The difficulty level, the story, the likelihood of failure in such a heinous game, a game that nobody won before...

"The Lord of Nightmares has a strong urge to kill you."

Somehow, I believe that dying by the male lead's hands would be faster.

title.en: Hajime no Ippo - The First Step

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

altTitles.ja: はじめの一歩

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami và Cuộc sống diệu kì!

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

altTitles.ja: リアデイルの大地にて

description.en:
The last thing she can remember is her life support beginning to fail. Her body had suffered terribly after a fateful accident and the only freedom left in her life came from the VR world of Leadale. Now she finds herself in a country very similar to Leadale and 200 years have passed.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1247p/) (Japanese)  
- [Official English Translation of the Light Novel](https://yenpress.com/9781975308681/in-the-land-of-leadale-vol-1-light-novel/)
description.ja:
生命維持装置によって命をつなぎ留めていた各務桂菜は、停電によって命を落とし、VRMMORPG『リアデイル』の200年後の世界に自身のアバターであるハイエルフの“ケーナ”として転生してしまう。

豊かな自然と高く澄んだ青空が広がるリアデイルの地で、200年の間に何が起こったのかを調べつつ、ケーナはこの世界に生きる人々やかつて自らが生み出したNPCと交流を深めていく

altTitles.ja: ヒゲと鈴としゃぼん玉

description.en: Santa and Rintarou are what can easily be described as an old married couple. they have been together for a long time and the series explores what is their day to day life.

altTitles.ja: タワーダンジョン

description.en:
The setting is a certain kingdom. In order to save the kidnapped princess of the kingdom, the Kingsguard squadron challenges the "Dragon Tower," a gigantic structure floating in the middle of the sky, but they are blocked by powerful demons.
A provocation is made by a neighboring village to replenish the injured personnel, and when a young man is sent to the tower, the wheel of fate begins to turn.

Tale of sword & sorcery and labyrinth exploration begins!
description.pt-br:
Para salvar a princesa Ignelia que foi sequestrada por um necromante, o Batalhão da Guarda Real se aventura pela “Torre do Dragão”, uma estrutura gigantesca que costumava flutuar no meio do céu, mas são bloqueados por criaturas poderosas. 
Uma ordem de recrutamento é enviado para uma aldeia vizinha para repor os soldados feridos, e quando um jovem é enviado para a Torre, a roda do destino começa a girar.

Começa a história de espadas, feitiçaria e exploração do labirinto!

altTitles.ja: ともことみつき

title.en: Starting Today, We’re Childhood Friends Spinoff

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ スピンオフ

altTitles.en: Starting Today We're Childhood Friends Spinoff

description.en: A spinoff focusing on the “mature” Nono Oomiya.

title.en: Koroshi Korosare Sankaku Kankei ni Watashi ga Ima kara Hairun desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 殺し殺され三角関係に私が今から入るんですか？

altTitles.en: Am I About to Join a Kill-Or-Be-Killed Love Triangle?

altTitles.ja-ro: Koroshi Korosare Sankaku Kankei ni Watashi ga Ima kara Hairun desu ka?

description.en:
Kohaku is a girl who spent her junior high school years as a loner and dreams of living a fulfilling life in high school. However, on her first day of school she falls down the stairs and ends up hospitalized for a month! This means that everyone besides her has already formed a group of friends at school... 
In order to avoid being a loner, she summons up the courage and calls out to the only odd-numbered group in her class, but it seems that they are high up in the school caste system, and are actually involved in a blood-splattered love triangle with a non-human...! 

A high tension high school comedy about escaping being the class loner!
description.ja: ぼっちな中学時代を過ごし、高校ではリア充生活を夢見る少女、コハク。だが入学初日に階段から足を滑らせてしまい、1か月入院することに！そうなると学校での友達グループも出来上がってしまっているわけで…。ぼっち回避のために勇気を出してクラス唯一の奇数人グループに声をかけるも、なんだかスクールカーストめっちゃ高そう＆実は人外混じりの百合百合血で血を洗う三角関係しており…！？目指せぼっち脱出ハイテンションハイスクールコメディ！
